autoFocus.description: Autofocus to the block on page load.

inputStyle.description: Css style to applied to input.

align.description: Align label left or right when inline.

extra.description: Extra text to display beneath the content - supports html.

hasFeedback.description: Display feedback extra from validation, this does not disable validation.

extraStyle.description: Css style to applied to label extra.

feedbackStyle.description: Css style to applied to label feedback.

min.description: Minimum value allowed by the block.

max.description: Maximum value allowed by the block.

placeholder.description: Placeholder text inside the block to show message before user types input.

decimalSeparator.description: Separator between number and decimal places.

precision.description: Precision (number of decimal places) allowed by the block.

step.description: The number to which the current value is increased or decreased. It can be an integer or decimal.

title.description: Number input label title - supports html.

onChange.description: Trigger actions when number is changed.

onPressEnter.description: Trigger actions when input is focused and enter is pressed.
